reviews.review: This is a game I really did not intend to play, but once I started, I just couldn't stop. Lots of fun with friends playing as Survivor, and equally fun alone as the Killer.

Great game on paper, it is a lot of fun. I dislike the perk system as it makes the game build v build, people who have been playing for ages have the deck stacked against new players. Not to mention the highly toxic community. I still have yet to see how "tunneling" is a bad thing for survivors. If the killer is tunneled on one person, then the rest of the team should focus on objective, but I digress.

It's a game of strategy, some survivors will try and lure you away from other survivors and when you don't fall for it, bully you. The game is highly stacked for survivors to win, while even the best killers don't win every time. If you can ignore the toxicity, and like live strategy games, that involve heavy mind games, this is the one for you. Just wish they'd add a bot match so you can try out killers/survivors without getting bullied and called bad at the game while you're trying to get a grasp on how the killer/survivor works.
Mas servidor menos skins, el juego es bueno pero los server no, si no fuera porque el server y los hitbox de ... del juego seria un muy bueno juego

Luego de 500hs de juego vengo a dar mi reseña/opinion:
DBD es un juego online de survival horror, donde 4 supervivientes tienen que escapar de 1 asesino, puedes elegir que rol tomar, si ser asesino o ser superviviente, cualquiera de estos (survivors y asesinos) tienen 4 casillas con diferentes habilidades unicas que son muy decisivas e importantes a la hora de sobrevivir / cazar.
Desde mi lugar, digo que es un juego excelente, con muy buenas graficas, con muy buenas mecanicas, con varios personajes de licencias como Michael Myers, Leatherface, Ghostface, Nemesis, etc. Pero tambien con muchos bugs, en lo personal, hay veces que molestan estos bugs y hay veces que no, ya que estoy acostumbrado a ellos. Por todo eso lo hace un juego unico donde no hay ningun otro juego que logre competir con este en su categoria. 
Si sos de llorar mucho, no te lo recomiendo. Pero si venis a jugar y a divertirte te lo super recomiendo. 
Nota 9/10 (por los bugs)
This game is awful, 2/10 I'm gonna play for another 1000 hours
personally i am the best player to ever touch this game, yes i recommend
Excelente, divertido, perfeito para conhecer pessoas incríveis e ótimo pra manter o coração em dia.

This game is great and its horrible. IF you have friends it is SO MUCH FUN!!! IF you do not have friends and que with other randoms, thats a mixed bag. I have two or 3 friends to play with so it is such a fun game! Also, playing killer is really fun, but is very hard. It is def worth picking up on sale. I even bought some DLC to support the devs. This really is the best game of this genre.
I think they did a pretty good job so far

SUPER FUN game if you are survivors main, or usually queue with your friends. BUT Survivors solo queue fucking sucks, and if you are decent at the killer the higher your rank is, the more toxic and impossible for you to play as one.

I have another 1k something hours on another account so keep this in mind.

This game is fucking toxic. It's probably the most fucking toxic game I have ever played in my life, and mind you I have 6k hours in Dota 2 and about 2k combined in CSGO and Valorant.

Dota 2 is toxic because people are piece of garbage, but at least in SEA people try to win, and reports actually work. Also the game itself is super balanced.

Now you come to DBD where they have just changed the matchmaking system, meaning the better you are as killer, the higher skill survivors you will play against. Imagine going up against 4 SWF who always bring Prove Thy Self and at least one brand new part every game. Also same perks on survivors pretty much every game. Dead hard/DS/Unbreakable/Borrowtime.

It's fun and okay at the early level, but once you got into rank 1 and stomp a lot of people, this game became a snooze fest. Dev has to balance the game toward survivors because they are harder to play at the beginning, but it's just absolutely nightmare to play as Killer in the highest level (Imagine the survivors might not be as good as Oracle, but they optimal survivors are exhausting as fuck)

The mechanics of the killer are also super limited at the highest level. You always need to bring at least 2 slow down perks, because otherwise the game will end in 4-5 minutes (It will probably end in 6-7 instead).  And you really need to resort to slugging and proxy camping people on hook, which would probably be fine if you didn't get called a mofo at end game chat by survivors everygame.

-rep BHVR , no boob totems ! >:(












...but i will continue playing it why not
